definition: a murderer, especially one who kills a prominent political figure, who kills by a surprise attack and often is hired to do the deed
details:
noun
- a murderer, especially one who kills a prominent political figure, who kills by a surprise attack and often is hired to do the deed
= example: a murderer, especially one who kills a prominent political figure, who kills by a surprise attack and often is hired to do the deed
= synonyms: bravo
- a member of a secret order of Muslims (founded in the 12th century) who terrorized and killed Christian Crusaders
